Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.reading

Class Reader

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.reading.Reader
public class Reader extends Object
This class handles extracting data from a file. CSV and XLSX files are supported.

  • Constructor Details

    • Reader

      public Reader(String path)
      Reader constructor. During instantiation file type is recognized and stored in fileType field.
      Parameters:
      path - path to a file.

  • Method Details

    • read

      public void read()
      method for extracting data depending on file extension.

    • readCSV

      public void readCSV()
      method to extract data from a csv file. Data are read row by row and then corresponding number of invoices are created.

    • readXLSX

      public void readXLSX()
      method to extract data from a xlsx file. Data are read row by row and cell by cell then corresponding number of invoices are created.
